Text: Thanks for uploading this Snowhiter, the series is really good, I downloaded 8 episodes, watched the first one today- man, it's compelling crime drama, great stuff. we owe you!!! Peace and many thanks, hope we get more folks seeding pleaseeeee!!!!
Great quality also I must add.  Subtitles more or less spot on, except for a few grammatical mistakes, which is okay
Still Very Much Appreciated. Maraming Salamat.
Finally created an account to say thank you for this quality show! I've downloaded all Varg Veum episodes and watched 1-5. Not a single problem with any of them!
